abstract: The Associated Press will create paid subscriptions through the Apple iPad for itself and other news organizations.
snippet: The Associated Press will create paid subscriptions through the Apple iPad for itself and other news organizations.
lead_paragraph: The Associated Press will create paid subscriptions through the Apple iPad for itself and other news organizations, the company’s leader said Friday, in the latest step of its campaign for the battered news business to control and profit from the electronic use of its work.

headline.main: Associated Press to Create Pay Service for iPad
